types.section:
{{fr-noun|m}}

# a [[fossil]] [[aquatic]] [[crocodilian]], of the clade {{taxlink|Mesoeucrocodylia|clade}}, from the Jurassic and Cretaceous of Western Europe
types.html:
mésosuchien m (plural mésosuchiens)

  1. a fossil aquatic crocodilian, of the clade Mesoeucrocodylia, from the Jurassic and Cretaceous of Western Europe
trans: a fossil aquatic crocodilian, of the clade Mesoeucrocodylia, from the Jurassic and Cretaceous of Western Europe
